name: Vitality Belt (Event)
description: Vitality Belt. Can be enchanted using the Vitality Belt Enchant Scroll. When enchanted, increases vitality maintenance effect, and decreases vitality maintenance re-use time. \0

name: For PC Cafe - Berserker Blade
description: PC cafe exclusive item that contains the strength of the Berserker Blade. Can be enchanted using the PC Cafe Exclusive Weapon Enhance Scroll. Also increases Critical by 73. Cannot be exchanged, dropped, or crystallized. Cannot be granted additional functions

name: Hero's Treasure Box
description: Contains an armor set 30-Day Pack, a Hunting Helper Exchange Coupon, and a hero's summon point item. Cannot be exchanged, dropped, or destroyed

name: Hero's Summon Point
description: When double clicked, 10000 PC Cafe Points can be acquired. Reuse Delay 7 days. Cannot be exchanged, dropped, or destroyed

name: Anniversary Party Cake
description: Energy is recovered for 1 hour when acquiring Exp. Reuse Delay is 12 hours. Cannot be exchanged, dropped, or destroyed

name: 6th Anniversary Party Earring (Event)
description: 30-day limited-time Item. Increases MP +31 and Resistance to Shock/mind attacks by 20%. Increases Shock/Mental attack rate by 20%. Has the vampiric rage effect. Only one effect is applied even when the two identical earrings are worn. Cannot be exchanged, dropped, or destroyed

name: 6th Anniversary Party Belt (Event)
description: 7-day limited-time Item. Energy is maintained for 30 minutes. Reuse Delay is 23 hours. Cannot be exchanged, dropped, or destroyed

name: Event - Halloween Candy
description: Sweet Halloween candy. You can give it to Skooldie to exchange for the Halloween Toy Box

name: Event - Uldie Summon Scroll
description: When used, summons the oldest girl Uldie among the Three Siblings, and can play Jack's game. You cannot summon Uldie if a pet is summoned or if the Halloween mask isn't equipped. You cannot play Jack's game is you are currently transformed or your stance is in a switched state!\0

name: Event - Belldandy Summon Scroll
description: When used, summons the middle child Belldandy among the Three Siblings, and can play Jack's game. You cannot summon Belldandy if a pet is summoned or if the Halloween mask isn't equipped. You cannot play Jack's game is you are currently transformed or your stance is in a switched state!\0

name: Event - Skooldie Summon Scroll
description: When used, summons the youngest child Skooldie among the Three Siblings, and can play Jack's game. You cannot summon Skooldie if a pet is summoned or if the Halloween mask isn't equipped. You cannot play Jack's game is you are currently transformed or your stance is in a switched state! Trade Cannot be dropped or destroyed

name: Halloween Toy Chest
description: Gives a chance to acquire one of Halloween masks. Cannot be exchange, dropped, or destroyed

name: Shiny Halloween Toy Chest
description: Gives a chance to acquire one of Shiny Halloween masks. Cannot be exchanged, dropped, or destroyed

name: Halloween Transformation Stick
description: You can transform to Halloween Pumpkin. 7-day limited period accessory. Cannot be exchanged, dropped, or destroyed

name: Transformation Scroll Box
description: Gives a chance to acquire one of the following transformation scrolls: Omen Beast, Death Blader, and Grail Apostle. Cannot be exchanged, dropped, or destroyed

name: Vitality Maintaining Potion (10 minutes)
description: Energy is maintained for 10 minutes. Reuse time is 30 minutes. Cannot be exchanged, dropped, or destroyed

name: 10,000 SP scroll
description: Scroll that replenishes 10,000 SP

name: Vitality Maintaining Potion (30 Minutes)
description: Your Vitality will remain at the same level for 30 minutes. Re-use time is 60 minutes. Cannot be exchanged, dropped or destroyed

name: Red Flare Valakas Hair Accessory
description: Burning red Valakas Helm. Cannot be exchanged or dropped

description: Contains a Shiny Planet X235 Alien's Mask. Cannot be exchanged, dropped, or stored in a private store

name: Halloween King Pumpkin Pack
description: Halloween King Pumpkin Pack. Contains 1 Halloween king pumpkin. Cannot be exchanged, dropped, or stored in a private store

name: Halloween Nectar Pumpkin
description: Halloween Nectar Pumpkin. With a certain chance, can obtain an energy replenishing drink or a feather of blessing and 1 small Halloween pumpkin. Can be exchanged. Cannot be dropped, put in private store, or destroyed

name: Halloween King Pumpkin
description: Halloween King Pumpkin. Contains 6 Halloween nectar pumpkins and a Golden Jack O'Lantern Mask (7 day limited). Can be exchanged. Cannot be dropped, put in private store, or destroyed

name: Small Halloween Pumpkin
description: Small Halloween Pumpkin. Double click and you can obtain 1 bonus item with a certain rate of chance. Cannot be exchanged, dropped, put in private store, or destroyed

description: Golden Jack O'Lantern Mask. Shines brightly. Reuse Delay 23 hour. Cannot be exchanged, dropped, or put in private store. Can be destroyed

name: Frozen Core
description: Magic stone that temporarily neutralizes Freya's powerful magic\0

name: Black Frozen Core
description: Magic stone that temporarily neutralizes Freya's powerful magic\0

name: Sealed Mystery Sword
description: Sacred sword that can neutralize Freya's power. Cannot use it directly due to some unknown M. Atk

name: Beast Handler's Whip
description: Obtained from Tunatun on the Beast Farm, this whip will enable the bearer to control tamed pets. Must be equipped to use

name: Golden Spice
description: Feed used to tame baby animals on the Beast Farm. Using this feed will allow the monster to drop adena and/or items, but will give less experience

name: Crystal Spice
description: Feed used to tame baby animals on the Beast Farm. This feed will cause the monster to give more experience, but no adena or items

name: Blessed Golden Spice
description: A better quality feed that has a chance to tame animals on the Beast Farm with just one application

name: Blessed Crystal Spice
description: A better quality feed that has a chance to tame animals on the Beast Farm with just one application

name: Golden Spice (S-Grade)
description: A better quality feed that has a chance to turn Beast Farm babies into fully grown pets with just one application. Using this feed will allow the monster to drop adena and/or items, but will give less experience

name: Crystal Spice (S-Grade)
description: A better quality feed that has a chance to turn Beast Farm babies into fully grown pets with just one application. This feed causes the monster to give more experience, but no adena or items

name: Old Golden Spice
description: Old and unusable Beast Farm Feed\0

name: Old Crystal Spice
description: Old and unusable Beast Farm Feed\0

name: Golden Spice Crate
description: This box hold up to 50 Golden Spices. When converted, there is also a chance that Special Feed will be received

name: Crystal Spice Compressed Pack
description: Small pack with a compressed Crystal Spice. When you use it, it changes into 50 Crystal Spices. Special Feed may also come out

name: High-level Angel Circlet
description: High-level Angel Circlet. Uses 2 hair accessory slots. Blessed Escape skill can be used

name: Torch
description: Can be used to light a fire. Cannot be exchanged, dropped, or put in private store

name: Spirit Stone Fragment
description: Energy from the Seed of Annihilation resides within these Spirit Stone Fragments. Can be used at Special Product Broker Kirklan

name: Maguen Plasma Collector
description: This device is used to collect plasma from the Wild Maguen that inhabit the Seed of Annihilation. Under the right circumstances, plasma collection allows you to obtain a pet Maguen

name: Maguen Pet Collar
description: Necklace that summons a Maguen. The summoned Maguen can eat wolf-type feed, and it takes away some of the experience points the Pet Master earns. No exchange, drop, sale, or mail available

name: Elite Maguen Pet Collar
description: Necklace that summons an Elite Maguen. The summoned Maguen can eat wolf-type feed, and it takes away some of the experience points the Pet Master earns. No exchange, drop, sale, or mail available

name: Maguen Collection Box
description: Its contents are a mystery. The only way to find out what is inside is to open it

name: Elite Maguen Collection Box
description: Its contents are a mystery. The only way to find out what is inside is to open it

name: Sel Mahum Salmon Porridge
description: Sel Mahum salmon porridge. Smells better than expected… but not by much

name: Fantasy Mushroom Pouch
description: Pouch containing the spores of Fantasy Mushrooms, which grow in the Plains of the Lizardmen. Detailed information can be obtained from Investigator Sally on the Plains of the Lizardmen

name: Sticky Mushroom Pouch
description: Pouch containing the spores of Sticky Mushrooms, which grow in the Plains of the Lizardmen. Detailed information can be obtained from Investigator Sally on the Plains of the Lizardmen

name: Vitality Plant Leaf
description: Leaf of the Energy Plant, which grows in the Plains of the Lizardmen. Detailed information can be obtained from Investigator Sally on the Plains of the Lizardmen

name: Seer Ugoros Pass
description: Document from Investigator Johnny in the Plains of the Lizardmen that verifies you possess the required skills. It indicates that you have the right to go and see Tanta Lizardman Seer Ugoros. Show it to Gatekeeper Batracos near the Plains of the Lizardmen

name: High-Grade Lizard Scale
description: The highest-quality Lizardman Scale without any blemishes obtained after defeating Tanta Lizardmen Seer Ugoros. Take it to Researcher Ankumi on the Plains of the Lizardmen

name: Middle-Grade Lizard Scale
description: The medium-quality Lizardman Scale obtained after defeating Tanta Lizardmen Seer Ugoros. Take it to Researcher Ankumi on the Plains of the Lizardmen

name: Vial of Tanta Blood
description: Vial containing the blood of Tanta Lizardmen. Take it to Investigator Laki on the Plains of the Lizardmen
